name: Chat-A-Lot
description:
Flip open your Nintendo 3DS™ and instantly connect with friends and family through a fun and interactive voice & text application! Chat from wherever you want, whenever you want with whoever you want! With Chat-A-Lot you can connect with Nintendo 3DS buddies from next door or from other countries in your region (Europe or Americas), keeping in touch and up to date with what they are up to! Create or take part in group chats of up to 10 people or mic chats with up to 4 pals! Draw pictures and select from a wide variety of cute and funny avatars to keep you chatting all day long!

Features:

  • Mic and Text Chat – create and join text and mic group chats
  • Choose Your Friends – Find and add friends through the Nintendo 3DS Friend List
  • Avatars – show your friends how you are feeling with mood adjustable avatars
  • Strict Parental Controls – password protected features for fun and secure chatting
